title: The Navajo: shepherds of the desert
creator_credit: Southventure Films, Coleman Film Enterprises and J. Donald McIntyre
brief_description: Describes a day in the life of a typical Navajo family. Shows the family at work, the tending and shearing sheep, rug weaving and the family’s social life.
creator_credit_for_label: Southventure Films, Coleman Film Enterprises and J. Donald McIntyre
